name: Hummus
keywords: Hummus, Vegetarian, Dip, Appetizer, Snack, Easy, Homemade, Chickpeas, Lemon Juice, Olive Oil, Tahini, Garlic, Healthy, Vegan, Mediterranean, Party Food, Middle Eastern, Quick, Simple, Pantry Staple
description: Delicious homemade hummus that's super easy to make.

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything but the water to the blender and blend until smooth. Will take a bit of mixing in between blending sessions to get smooth. Add water and olive oil to help blend and make the mix smoother. Don't forget to taste and add extra salt, lemon juice or garlic to your liking.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend Ingredients

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy with cut up carrots, a nice sourdough or whatever you like dipping in hummus!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: Great with roasted garlic instead of regular minced garlic for added flavor.
It's a healthy and vegan-friendly dip option for snacks and appetizers.
